   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to 2x2x2 Explorer's documentation!
==========================================

Welcome!

2x2x2 Explorer is a special library written to aid in developing new algorithms for the Pocket Cube.
Pocket Cube is minified version of the legendary Rubik's Cube (it's dimensions are 2x2x2 instead of
3x3x3).

2x2x2 Explorer provides tools for computing various algorithms and for analyzing every possible 2x2x2
situation in general.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   intro
   traversal
   tips
